title: Argus Biomass Conference
description: Three days of market insights and focused networking for decision makers from across the global biomass supply chain
text: The Argus Biomass 2016 conference will take place on the 5 - 7 April at the Hilton Park Lane, London. The 7th annual event will bring together key market players in the biomass sector involved in both the industrial and premium pellet market to discuss the key issues affecting the market.
